interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Veggie Tales: Lord of the Beans, A Lesson in Using Your GIfts
Review Date: 2017/05/05
Store: Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'VeggieTales: Lord of the Beans ™ follows the fantastic journey of a Flobbit named Toto Baggypants (Junior Asparagus) who inherits a most unusual and powerful bean. With the help of his mentor Randalf and a spirited group of friends, Toto embarks on a mission to discover how he should use his gift. On their quest, the group encounters many challenges, including crossing the mountains of Much-Snowia, and facing the dreaded Lord Scaryman – who seeks the bean for misguided, selfish reasons. Will Toto discover the purpose of his gift, or will the scary dude and his Spork army capture the bean and wield its awesome powers? Find out in VeggieTales: Lord of the Beans.™', 'Bonus Content:', 'Behind the Scenes', 'Behind the Scenes', 'Wynonna Music Video', 'Wynonna Music Video', 'Interview with Wynonna', 'Interview with Wynonna', 'Video Trivia', 'Video Trivia', 'Sing-Along with Larry', 'Sing-Along with Larry', 'Lord of the Beans Game', 'Lord of the Beans Game', "Toto's Family Activity", "Toto's Family Activity", "The Other Elf's Secret Cookie Recipe", "The Other Elf's Secret Cookie Recipe", 'How to Draw Toto', 'How to Draw Toto', 'How to Draw Leg-O-Lamb', 'How to Draw Leg-O-Lamb', 'Previews', 'Previews', ']]>', 'About the Author', 'Cuando el animador por computadora, Phil Vischer, busco una nueva manera de integrar la fe con los cuentos, nacio un tomate llamado Bob y un pepino llamado Larry. VeggieTales paso a revolucionar la cinematografia cristiana, vendiendo mas de 40 millones de videos y poniendo sus historias llenas de fe en uno de cada tres hogares norteamericanos con ninos pequenos. Vive con su esposa Lisa, sus tres hijos y un perro en Illinois.Mike Nawrocki is co-creator of the popular series, VeggieTales . Acting as the voice of Larry the Cucumber, and several other Veggie characters, Mike also wrote, directed, and contributed to the development of the 3-2-1 Penguins series. He resides in Chicago, IL, with his wife and 2 children.Cuando el animador por computadora, Phil Vischer, busco una nueva manera de integrar la fe con los cuentos, nacio un tomate llamado Bob y un pepino llamado Larry. VeggieTales paso a revolucionar la cinematografia cristiana, vendiendo mas de 40 millones de videos y poniendo sus historias llenas de fe en uno de cada tres hogares norteamericanos con ninos pequenos. Vive con su esposa Lisa, sus tres hijos y un perro en Illinois.']
Average Rating: 4.8

reference_summary:
Yo Gabba Gabba: There's a Party in My City! Live Concert
Biz Markie  (Actor),     Yo Gabba Gabba  (Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
["Join D.J. Lance Rock, Brobee, Toodee, Foofa, Plex, Muno and all of our favorite Yo Gabba Gabba! friends for their first-ever live concert! Yo Gabba Gabba! Live!: There's a Party in My City! is a non-stop musical extravaganza. Get up on your feet to sing and dance along over ten Gabba favorites, including: There's a Party in My Tummy, Name Game and Get The Sillies Out. This full-length concert is packed with special guests including beatboxing legend Biz Markie performing Biz's Beat of the Day, the incomparable Leslie Hall & DO IT teaching a Dancey Dance, and Super Music Friends Show guest The Aquabats performing everyone's favorite, Pool Party. Yo Gabba Gabba! Live!: There's a Party in My City! will get the whole family dancing and singing no matter what city you're in!"]

Spaced Invaders [DVD]
Douglas Barr  (Actor),     Royal Dano  (Actor),     Patrick Read Johnson  (Director, Writer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Science Fiction, Aliens
["They're hip! They're hilarious! Earth will never be the same! It's a close encounter of the hilarious kind when five of the universe's coolest aliens crash-land on planet Earth! Piloted by an ultrahip Martian, the cosmic crew ends up in a sleepy Midwestern town. Unfortunately, it's Halloween night and the citizens mistake these spaced invaders for harmless trick-or-treaters. Instead of the global invasion they planned on, these misguided Martians bungle their way into a series of madcap misadventures! Get set for an outrageous blast of intergalactic fun and outlandish special effects in this wacked-out comedy-adventure!"]

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Target Audience**: Engaging children with a strong focus on family-oriented content that resonates with younger family members.
- **Content Type**: Enjoys interactive, musical, and performance-based entertainment that encourages singing and dancing, alongside comedic and adventurous themes.
- **Emotional Engagement**: Values joyful moments and connections with family, particularly embracing the role of a special grandparent. Despite a typical preference for high-quality content, the user exhibits a growing flexibility in ratings.
- **Rating Preference**: Generally favors high-quality offerings with ratings typically between 4 to 5 stars. Recently, a willingness to explore broader content is evident, as seen through a 3-star rating, suggesting a more open approach to entertaining the family.
- **Purchase Motivation**: Driven by a desire to entertain and foster laughter within the family, the user is increasingly incorporating comedic elements and themes that blend humor with moral lessons.
- **Product Format**: Prefers physical media, especially DVDs, to ensure accessible family viewing experiences.

This updated profile highlights the user's continued dedication to nurturing family relationships through engaging children's entertainment while reflecting their evolving perspective on content quality.
